author: eptwts
text:
one of the biggest psyops social media has surfaced is that there's people out there who are truly locked in 24/7...

i know some absolute killers & most of them do things that you'd imagine as "unproductive" for a large part of their day - e.g. scrolling social media, playing games, etc.

believe me when i tell you that NOBODY is locked in 24/7 - even elon finds time to shitpost, watch tv shows & play games

if you can make 5 hours of your day translate into some form of measurable progress then you're literally ahead of 99.99% of the worlds population on that given day
